column1: Ladies and gentlemen, we at Subway are happy to inform you that Jared has elected to stay in South Park in order to speak to you once again!
Uh, the opinions expressed by Mr. Vogle are not necessarily those of the Subway Company.
Jared, first of all we want to say that all of us here at Subway appreciate everything you've done for our company.
Well, your new slogan, for instance.  "When it comes to fitness, Subway goes hand in hand with aides."
